title: Charlie Daniels Band + Friends - Volunteer Jam 1975
description:
From way back in time, when CDB was more a southern rock band than a country band.

Mainly recorded September 9. 1975 at the Murphy Center on campus at Middle Tennessee State University in Murfreesboro, Tennessee.

Musicians on ?Volunteer Jam part 1-3?:
Richard Betts ? guitar, Toy Caldwell ? steel guitar, Jerry Eubanks ? sax, Sam McPherson ? harmonica, Jamie Nichol ? congos, Artmus Pyle ? Congos, Paul Riddle ? drums ? and the Charlie Daniels Band.

Musicians on ?Whiskey?, ?Birmingham Blues? and ?The South?s Gonna do it?:
The Charlie Daniels Band: Charlie Daniels ? vocals, electric and slide guitars and fiddle, Tom Crain ? guitar, Joel DiGregorio ? organ and piano, backup vocal on ?Whiskey?,  Charlie Hayward ? bass, Fred Edwards ? drums, Don Murray ? drums.

Musicians on ?The thrill is gone?
Toy Caldwell ? guitar, Tom Caldwell ? bass, George McCorkle ? guitar, Doug Grey ? vocal and tambourine, Jerry Eubanks ? alto sax, Paul Riddle ? drums, Chuck Leavell ? piano, Jimmy Hall ? harmonica, Charlie Daniels ? guitar, Richard Betts ? guitar, Fred Edwards ? drums, Jaimie Nichols ? congas.

Musicians on ?Sweet Mama?:
Richard Betts ? vocals and guitar, Chuck Leavell ? piano, Charlie Daniels ? slide guitar, David Brown ? bass, Don Murray ? drums, George McCorkle ? organ, Gary Peacemaker ? drums.

Musicians on ?Mountain Dew?:
Charlie Daniels ? vocals and fiddle, Richard Betts ? guitar, Chuck Leavell ? piano, Ronnie Stoneman ? banjo, Charlie Hayward ? bass, Joel DiGregorio ? organ, Fred Edwards ? drums, Gary Peacemaker ? drums, Mylon LeFevre ? harmony vocals and tambourine.

This is a LP+EP rip, processed to eliminate noise.

Enjoy, please comment and seed.
